Question: Beijing Keyi Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Beijing Keyi Technology Co., Ltd. - CES 2024

ClicBot

- Consumer level robot with industrial control algorithm
- Fuses robot control, sense, and AI with animated design
- Over 10,000 users from 87 countries with more than 40,000 robot designs
- Teams include robotics engineers, algorithm engineers, and animatronics designers
- Over 40 times oversubscribed on Kickstarter, raising US$900,000 from 1,678 backers
- Named "Best Coding Robot" by Forbes in 2021
- Aims to expand sales by upgrading the robot and establishing relationships with more domestic retailers
- Designed to provide a platform for children to realize their imagination and gain recognition for their creativity
Summary_cn:
北京科易技术有限公司 - CES 2024

ClicBot

- 具有工业控制算法的消费级机器人
- 将机器人控制、感知和人工智能与动画设计融合
- 来自87个国家的超过10,000名用户，具有超过40,000种机器人设计
- 团队包括机器人工程师、算法工程师和动画设计师
- 在Kickstarter上超额认购40多倍，从1,678名支持者筹集了90万美元
- 被《福布斯》2021年评为“最佳编程机器人”
- 目标是通过升级机器人和与更多国内零售商建立关系来扩大销售额
- 设计为为孩子们提供实现想象力和获得对他们创造力的认可的平台
